p: This observation is supported by the high contents of phenolics/flavonoids, RSA and AEAC recorded in arjuna, guggul and olive honeys ( Table 3) and agrees with previous investigations reporting that polyphenols modulate Kelch-like ECH associated protein 1/Nrf2/antioxidant response elements (Keap1/Nrf2/ARE) gene pathway that leads to the amelioration of oxidative stress in vitro and in vivo [ 15, 61, 62, 63].
